text:
Hi Claudio.

There shouldn’t be a need to redirect if I’m understanding you correctly.

Here is how you set up a domain:
@             A Record     192.111.111.11
www       A Record     192.111.111.11

So both should point to the same IP.

And then you will use the CNAME to point the domain to your HubSpot portal as per this link: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/connect-a-domain-to-HubSpot>

We are going to be slowly moving the rendered style block of drag and drop area editor styles from the footer, to the head html of pages to prevent a flash of unstyled content.

This has potential to impact some existing pages, in that we are moving CSS to being loaded in a different location on a page, and therefore potentially at a different precedence.

If anyone has particular portals they would like this applied to immediately, please feel free to DM me.
